doc.title: WHATWG

value.content: The WHATWG (Web Hypertext Application Technology Working Group) is a community that maintains and develops web standards, including DOM, Fetch, and HTML. Employees of Apple, Mozilla, and Opera established WHATWG in 2004.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• WHATWG on Wikipedia
  • WHATWG website
